scripts.test-backend: cross-env-shell DJANGO_MEMCACHE=dummy "cd backend && python manage.py test && flake8"
scripts.backend-test: cross-env-shell DB_NAME=media_review_app_test DJANGO_MEMCACHE=dummy "cd backend && python manage.py runserver"
scripts.frontend-test: cross-env BROWSER=none PORT=3006 npm start --prefix frontend
scripts.dump-data: cd backend && python manage.py dumpdata auth.user | jq > ./user/fixtures/user.json && python manage.py dumpdata user.userprofile | jq > ./user/fixtures/userprofile.json && python manage.py dumpdata review.asset | jq > ./review/fixtures/asset.json && python manage.py dumpdata review.media | jq > ./review/fixtures/media.json && python manage.py dumpdata review.project | jq > ./review/fixtures/project.json && python manage.py dumpdata review.review | jq > ./review/fixtures/review.json && python manage.py dumpdata review.feedback | jq > ./review/fixtures/feedback.json
scripts.flush-data: cross-env-shell DB_NAME=media_review_app_test "cd backend && python manage.py flush --noinput"
scripts.migrate: cross-env-shell DB_NAME=media_review_app_test "cd backend && python manage.py migrate"
scripts.load-data: cross-env-shell DB_NAME=media_review_app_test "cd backend && python manage.py loaddata user_test profile_test"
scripts.load-data-dev: cd backend && python manage.py loaddata user userprofile asset project review media feedback
scripts.backend-test-shell: cross-env-shell DB_NAME=media_review_app_test "cd backend && python manage.py shell"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && rm -rf backend/client/build && mv -f frontend/build ./backend/client/ && cd backend/client/build && cp asset-manifest.json manifest.json service-worker.js service-worker.js.map robots.txt favicon.ico *.png *.xml *.svg ./static
